texts.removalConfirmation: Do you really want to remove this entry?
texts.removalConfirmationDefault:
Do you really want to remove this entry?
This is a default mailbox!
texts.demoText:
Hello,

Seems like this is the first time that You are logging into the project.

Please keep in mind that the Demo mode is turned on, thus some functionality has been limited (for example You won't be able to send any message).

This popup is shown only upon first login.

fails.noEmailAccountHasBeenSelected: No email account has been provided for E-Mail sending

texts.general: <i>Allows to test given sending email directly without saving it in the database.<i>
texts.demo:
<i>
  Allows to test given sending email directly without saving it in the database (default connection is used).
  Keep in mind that E-mails used for testing messages sending might be banned/suspended by the Mailbox itself
  due to excessive spamming - this will result in internal error as the mailbox will no longer be reachable.
<i>

messages.noMailAccountHasBeenFound: No mail account has been found

texts.general: <i>Management of existing webhooks definitions. Each message inserted to the database has a relation to the webhook. Upon removing the webhook, messages related to the hook are reassigned to the placeholder webhook, and are additionally marked as deleted, thus will never be sent by cron.<i>
